name: NHL 97
overview: Head-to-head action so real you can't play just one game. You want more checks, more speed, more kick saves, more NHL hockey. It's all here. NEW Skills Challenge: See how you measure up in the Puck Blast, Rapid Fire, Shooting Accuracy, and Puck Handling Relay. Legendary EA Sports gameplay plus all the players, all the teams, and all 26 home rinks! NEW Signature Moves: 15 moves from NHL stars! Fake the shot, through your legs and around the defenseman.
